title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, July 11, 2020
description: “To Kill a Mockingbird” was published on this date 60 years ago. Harper Lee said, “I was hoping for a quick and merciful death at the hands of the reviewers.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: “To Kill a Mockingbird” was published on this date 60 years ago. Harper Lee said, “I was hoping for a quick and merciful death at the hands of the reviewers.”
